intro: I'm a passionate software engineer with a love for building robust, scalable applications. My journey in technology has been driven by curiosity and a desire to create meaningful solutions that make a difference.
values: Write code that is maintainable, well-documented, and follows best practices
Embrace continuous learning and stay current with emerging technologies
Foster open source collaboration and contribute back to the community
Design systems with security, scalability, and performance in mind
Take ownership and responsibility for code quality and project outcomes
Contributing to the advancement of decentralized technologies
Maintaining curiosity and a growth mindset
